entry.cap:areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 23 at 8:57PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Patchy Dense Fog Developing Across Volusia County This Evening... Motorists should use caution on roadways this evening into the overnight and be alert for rapidly
entry.cap:areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia

entry.title: Flood Warning issued November 23 at 8:15PM EST until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .The Saint Johns River at Astor is forecast to continue a slow fall while remaining in Moderate Flood stage this week and into this weekend. Residents and interests along the river should expect continuing Moderate flood impacts.
